title: LS-Powered 1968 Chevrolet Corvette Convertible 5-Speed
description: This 1968 Chevrolet Corvette convertible was acquired by the seller in 2021 and subsequently fitted with an LS-based V8, which is noted to displace 7.0 liters and was assembled with Darton sleeves, an LS7-specification crankshaft, and forged pistons. The engine is backed by a Tremec five-speed manual transmission and a Dana 44 rear end. The car rides on 18" American Racing Draft wheels and a Street Shop chassis that has QA1 coilovers as well as C4 Corvette-specification suspension and brakes. It was refinished in blue under prior ownership and has since been equipped with a side-exit exhaust system. Sound-dampening material was also applied to the interior, which features black vinyl upholstery, Vintage Air air conditioning, an Ididit steering column, Dakota Digital gauges, and power windows. This C3 convertible is now offered with a body-color removable hardtop, invoices, and a clean Tennessee title in the name of the seller's family trust.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a LS-Powered 1968 Chevrolet Corvette Convertible 5-Speed at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #196,221.
